item.description:
Donâ€™t Spread the Lead


Lead Paint Expert, Rick Reibstein will discuss the new lead laws that affect real estate investors.



Real Estate investors should understand how the law concerning lead is evolving. This development does not mean that the risk of owning older housing has become unacceptable. It has always been possible to live safely with lead paint, and the new rule simply helps to ensure that the proper approach is taken.Understanding how to reduce the risks that have always been present is not just an important aspect of real estate management, but a significant opportunity for smart real estate investors.




6:30 PM, Wednesday, July 14, 2010

Best Western Executive Court

13500 South Willow Street, Manchester

Free for members; $20 for non-members
item.name: The New Hampshire Real Estate Investors Association Monthly Meetup
